content.rendered:
Are you interested in building products used by over millions people? Do you like shipping code at a rapid pace? lululemon is seeking Software Engineering intern who is passionate about building desktop web applications.

Minimum Qualification:

  • Must be pursuing a degree in Software, Engineering, Computer science or related field.
  • Working Knowledge of Python, HTML/CSS/JS/React, or the ability to learn them quickly
  • Knowledge of software version control systems
  • Knowledge of how web applications works
  • Knowledge with unit testing frameworks.
  • A passion for solving problems and desire to understand how things work.

Our “must haves”:

  • Proven work ethic with utmost integrity
  • Desire to excel and succeed
  • Self-awareness, with a desire for constant self improvement (goal -oriented)
  • Entrepreneurial spirit and an egoless nature
  • Self motivated, passionate, empathetic, approachable
